prosumer.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a customer who wants to buy high quality equipment, which has the same features as the equipment used by professionals
prosumer.translation[0].definitions[0].e: DVD Workshop Express is aimed at prosumers who want to create professional-looking DVD productions.
prosumer.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a customer who knows a lot about a particular type of product, who is used by a company to help design and develop its products
prosumer.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Prosumers are far more likely than ordinary consumers to be consulted for their opinions on companies and brands.
